reviewText: This tape is typical playboy waste of money. The chapter called Rub A Dub Dub that is of the triplets taking a bath is worth the price of the entire DVD. This chapter is a smokin' hot piece of soft core that gives you a jolt in the jollys.

Not the best Playboy effort, but worth checking out.  The Dahm triplets are cute, and the model at the end has some hot scenes.  Not a very creative video overall, but if you want to watch beautiful women nude, this is a good video to pick up.

The Dahm triplets are great women theres no doubt about it, but Vanessa Gleason really makes herself known in this video. Vanessa could have very eaisly been the MAIN FEATURE in this video. If you do not believe this respond with negative feedback!!

My three stars is not a reflection of the Dahm girls. They are fantastic to look at, 5 stars alone for their looks. But the video wasn't as imaginative as I was hoping it would be. Considering that there are 3  identical women there could have been a thousand possibilities, but the  advantage wasn't fully used.
The closest was a science lab cloning  scene, where one Dahm girl becomes 3. Again, not a great theme. But, the  girls look "hot!" in this particular scene. They start off  completely nude, no annoying wait to see some skin, you are treated to  seeing them in the buff right away. In fact one thing I will say in  Playboy's favor, is they seem to be changing direction in their videos and  featuring their Playmates more in the nude and less in clothes. If you  found looking at the Dahm sisters naked in the mag, and you don't mind  boring direction, then watch this vid, because you'll see very little of  them in clothes.
Vanessa Gleason's segment deserves 5 stars. The last  scene is the best. She enters a strange house and then drinks some wine.  After one sip, her dress mysteriously and instantly gets torn off of her,  and in a second you are treated to viewing her luscious nude body. After  this happens, she's slightly startled and runs around naked in an effort to  escape, but quickly and comfortably settles into several sexy and sumptuous  poses. This scene alone is worth the purchase of the video.

I thought that some very clever photography of the three triplets together raised this video above the usual video centerfold.  There are two scenes in particular where the effect is very pleasing as we see one triplet, but  then another emerges from behind her, and then the third from behind the  first two.  And the triplets are cute!  Maybe this isn't what a lot of  people are looking for in a video centerfold, but I wanted to add my two  cents.  I enjoyed this video more than the usual playboy video centerfold.
